summary: The film represents life in a godforsaken Russian village. The only way to reach the mainland is to cross the lake by boat and a postman became the only connection with the outside world. A... See full summary Â»
cast: Aleksey Tryapitsyn|Irina Ermolova|Timur Bondarenko|Viktor Kolobkov|Viktor Berezin|Tatyana Silich|Irina Silich|Yuriy Panfilov|Nikolay Kapustin|Sergey Yurev|Valentina Ananina|Lyubov Skorina|Lyubov Zykova|Natalya Semyonova|Margarita Titova|Aleksey Molchanov|Viktor Babich|Anna Trach
title: El cartero de las noches blancas
